name: Five Nights at Sonic's 3 Reimagined
description:
Story:

It's been 10 years since the new Sega Inc. burned down. After some thinking over, a few former employees decide to revive the Sega Inc. chain. They insisted on it being a horror attraction instead of an Incorporation. While building the new place, a couple of employees decide to re-check the old locations. When they checked the burned location, one of the employees found a hidden shed. They looked in the shed to discover something amazing.

Credits:

TheCyVap: Creating the original FNaS3

BrawlBox: Character Models

Phone Guy Voice: Fizz (Discord: Fizz#8986)

Sega: Sonic and Co.

More credits soon.
